Adam Michael Wood

Reunion

by Adam Michael Wood
Twixt sorrow and the joy of being near, We sing for comfort, and for God to hear. Though fleeting comfort is, and absence long, there is no cold despairing in our song. For that same God who joined us also parts, and strengthens for the breaking of our hearts. Composer of the Heavens, make us new That we might in all places sing for You, And if it pleases, let it not be long Til scattered friends again rejoice in song.
